title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // THEY'RE BACK
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: If they only show up for 2 episodes I won’t be happy! I want them in at least 10 episodes!
Hopefully this season will have 12 or even 13 episodes or I won't be satisfied 😤

My theory is Cordelia brings back Madison and Myrtle (by reviving them obiv) and she and them try to escape the school but zombies are surrounding the school. Cordelia has a vision of her being eaten and finds another way out of the school and fog is surrounding the place since it was destroyed
I thought Jessica Lange was making an appearance this season? I miss her! She is such an amazing actress.
My wig isn’t stable enough for this omg where are my pins
